001package eu.andredick.tools;
002
003import java.io.*;
004import java.net.HttpURLConnection;
005import java.net.MalformedURLException;
006import java.net.URL;
007import java.nio.channels.Channels;
008import java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel;
009import java.nio.file.Files;
010import java.nio.file.Path;
011import java.util.zip.GZIPInputStream;
012
013
014public class FileTools {
015    /**
016     * 从指定路径提取文件
017     * @param path      文件路径
018     * @param filename  文件名
019     * @return          文件流
020     */
021    public static InputStream getStreamFromPackageFile(String path, String filename) {
022        InputStream resourceAsStream = FileTools.class.getResourceAsStream(path + filename);
023        return resourceAsStream;
024    }
025
026    public static InputStream getStreamFromLocalGZIPFile(File file) {
027        InputStream inputStream = null;
028        try {
029            FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(file);
030            inputStream = new GZIPInputStream(fis);
031        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
032            e.printStackTrace();
033        } catch (IOException e) {
034            e.printStackTrace();
035        }
036        return inputStream;
037    }
038
039    public static InputStream getStreamFromLocalFile(File file) {
040        InputStream inputStream = null;
041        try {
042            inputStream = new FileInputStream(file);
043        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
044            e.printStackTrace();
045        }
046        return inputStream;
047    }
048
049
050    public static void extractFileFromGZIP(File sourceFile, File destinationFile) {
051        try {
052            FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(sourceFile);
053            GZIPInputStream gis = new GZIPInputStream(fis);
054            FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(destinationFile);
055            byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];
056            int len;
057            while ((len = gis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
058                fos.write(buffer, 0, len);
059            }
060            fos.close();
061            gis.close();
062            fis.close();
063        } catch (IOException e) {
064            e.printStackTrace();
065        }
066    }
067
068    public static boolean downloadFile(String url, File destinationFile) {
069        boolean success = false;
070        URL website = null;
071        try {
072            website = new URL(url);
073            ReadableByteChannel rbc = Channels.newChannel(website.openStream());
074            FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(destinationFile);
075            fos.getChannel().transferFrom(rbc, 0, Long.MAX_VALUE);
076            fos.close();
077            rbc.close();
078            success = true;
079        } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
080            e.printStackTrace();
081        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
082            e.printStackTrace();
083        } catch (IOException e) {
084            e.printStackTrace();
085        }
086        return success;
087    }
088
089    public static boolean existsOnlineFile(String url) {
090        try {
091            HttpURLConnection.setFollowRedirects(false);
092            HttpURLConnection con = (HttpURLConnection) new URL(url).openConnection();
093            con.setRequestMethod("HEAD");
094            return (con.getResponseCode() == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK);
095        } catch (Exception e) {
096            e.printStackTrace();
097            return false;
098        }
099    }
100
101    public static boolean existsLocalFile(File file) {
102        if (file.exists() && file.isFile()) {
103            return true;
104        }
105        return false;
106    }
107
108    public static boolean existsLocalFolder(File folder) {
109        if (folder.exists() && folder.isDirectory()) {
110            return true;
111        }
112        return false;
113    }
114
115    public static boolean canWriteInPath(Path path) {
116        if (Files.isWritable(path)) {
117            return true;
118        }
119        return false;
120    }
121
122    public static boolean canWriteFile(File file) {
123        if (file.canWrite()) {
124            return true;
125        }
126        return false;
127    }
128}
